2.title: About
2.content: This website contains the course notes for COS 324 - Introduction to Machine Learning at Princeton University. The notes were prepared by professors Sanjeev Arora, Danqi Chen and undergraduates Simon Park, and Dennis Jacob. If you find any typos or mistakes, or have any comments or feedback, please submit them here. It will be helpful if you specify the version of the notes. The last modified date can be found on the copyright page.

5.title: 1. Supervised Learning
5.content: Ch 1 Linear Regression: An Introduction Ch 2 Statistical Learning: What It Means to Learn Ch 3 Optimization via Gradient Descent Ch 4 Linear Classification Ch 5 Exploring “Data Science” via Linear Regression

6.title: 2. Unsupervised Learning
6.content: Ch 6 Clustering Ch 7 Low-Dimensional Representation Ch 8 n-Gram Language Models Ch 9 Matrix Factorization and Recommender Systems

7.title: 3. Deep Learning
7.content: Ch 10 Introduction to Deep Learning Ch 11 Feedforward Neural Network and Backpropagation Ch 12 Convolutional Neural Network

8.title: 4. Reinforcement Learning
8.content: Ch 13 Introduction to Reinforcement Learning Ch 14 Markov Decision Process Ch 15 Reinforcement Learning in Unknown Environment

9.title: 5. Advanced Topics
9.content: Ch 16 Machine Learning and Ethics Ch 17 Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing
